no.uio.duo

Class CristinIngestionWorkflow

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uio.duo.CristinIngestionWorkflow

  • public class CristinIngestionWorkflow
extends java.lang.Object

    Implementation of the Harveter's IngestionWorkflow, providing hooks for the OAI-PMH harvesting features.

    Provides implementations for preUpdate, postUpdate and postCreate.

    If a new item comes in the postCreate method will just start the workflow.

    If an updated item comes in, the preUpdate method will determine (based on the Cristin workflow requirements) whether a clone of the item being updated is necessary, and if so will handle that process.

    Configuration

    Configure this in the dspace.cfg file as a named plugin of the IngestionWorkflow interface:

     plugin.named.org.dspace.harvest.IngestionWorkflow = \
        no.uio.duo.CristinIngestionWorkflow = cristin

      • preUpdate

        public Item preUpdate(Context context,
                      Item item,
                      Collection targetCollection,
                      HarvestedItem harvestedItem,
                      java.util.List<Element> descMD,
                      Element oreREM)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      AuthorizeException
        Carry out any activities required prior to updating an item, and return the item which will ultimately be updated. This will do the following things: - if the item is archived and the incoming documents are different, it will create a new version of the item in the workspace - otherwise it will return the passed item unchanged
        Parameters:
        context -
        item -
        targetCollection -
        harvestedItem -
        descMD -
        oreREM -
        Returns:
        Throws:

      • postUpdate

        public void postUpdate(Context context,
                       Item item)
                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       AuthorizeException
        After an item has been updated, this method will be run to finish up. This will carry out the following actions: - it will determine if the item's unit codes have changed, and alert the administrator if they have - if the item is in the workspace, it will trigger the workflow - if the item is in the workflow, it will restart the workflow from the start
        Parameters:
        context -
        item -
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException
        AuthorizeException
